text:
e="preserve">Tord Peterson (21 April 1926 – 11 January 2021) was a Swedish actor. He was in more than 80 movies and television shows from 1953 to 2013. He was born in Stockholm, Sweden.
Peterson was in "The Shot" (1969), "Grisjakten" (1970), "Honeymoon" (1972), "House of Angels" (1992), "House of Angels – The Second Summer" (1994) and "Echoes from the Dead" (2013).
Peterson died on 11 January 2021 in Stockholm, aged 94.

annotations.surface_form: House of Angels – The Second Summer
